pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption:
This is a scenery shot featuring a camera focus pull. The primary motion is the change in focus, which brings the background into sharp view. The water in the small waterfall is also flowing.
